DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind study evaluate Desvenlafaxine Succinate Sustained-Release ( DVS SR ) versus placebo Treatment Children Adolescent Outpatients Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of DVS SR In Treatment Of Children And Adolescent Outpatients With MDD
DOC.criteria: Age > =7 < 18 year age Primary diagnosis major depressive disorder ( MDD ) CDRSR score > 40 History suicidal behavior require precaution suicide Not generally healthy medical condition History psychosis bipolar disorder Seizure disorder
